title: London/Hornchurch
name: Queen's Theatre
content: 500-seat theatre with an active production company called [http://www.queens-theatre.co.uk/page/11/em-cut-to-the-chase-em Cut to the Chase] and regular performances. The theatre opened in its current purpose-built site in 1975. The Arts Council of England provide funding for the theatre and it is also a registered charity.
